特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course meets once per week and will be conducted in English only. Students will practice verbal communication skills suitable for future business needs. Textbook and written work will provide input and language basis regarding business English as it is used in workplaces. Materials will also be provided for working on short presentation skills suitable for business contexts. Class time will be devoted to pairwork and discussions, along with presentations. Homework and written preparation for discussions and presentations outside of class will be essential. Work with video to record video CVs and practice interview skills will also be done. Classes are currently planned to be taught face-to-face in the classroom; adaptations may be made based on changing conditions and university policies. Active student interaction and participation is a strong expectation of this course. Students are expected to follow safety protocols (i.e. wearing masks and respecting social distancing) during all face-to-face classes.
